parameter.name: filePath
parameter.shortdesc: The full path name of the new assignment.

parameter.name: forceSave
parameter.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new Assignment &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Assignment.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Assignment with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Assignment with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the Assignment with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Assignments within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The Assignment, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Assignment, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The Assignment, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Assignment, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Assignment in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Assignment in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Assignment in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Assignment with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the Assignment that follows the desired Assignment.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Assignment whose index follows the specified Assignment in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The Assignment whose index comes before the desired Assignment.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Assignment in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Assignment in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Assignment.
Returns the Assignment with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
